ReadableStreamLocked.summary: The locked read-only property of the interface returns whether or not the readable stream is locked to a reader.

remarks.para:
A readable stream can have at most one active reader at a time, and is locked to that reader until it is released.
A reader might be obtained using ReadableStream.getReader() and released using the reader's releaseLock() method.

ReadableStreamLocked.value: A boolean value indicating whether or not the readable stream is locked.
